PalWorld.SteamCmdExecPath: not null path string, requires a executable file;
PalWorld.PalWorldExecPath: not null path string, requires a executable file;
PalWorld.MemThreshold: nullable percentage double ranges from 0.0 to 1.0, default to 0.9;
PalWorld.CustomPort: nullable int, default to 8211 when null;
PalWorld.DoUpdate: nullable bool value, default to true;
